Title: Simple WPF MessageBox
Description: This library provides an easy way to customize and use a WPF Message Box using a ViewModel and Styles.
HomeWiki:
Fully Customizable WPF Message Box
This library provides an easy to customize and use WPF Message Box using a ViewModel and Styles.

 

Contains a ScrollViewer to handle long messages and the ability to select and copy the text.
